Title: Back to the Beach
Writer: James Komack (story), Bill Norton (story), Bruce Kirschbaum (story), Peter Krikes (screenplay), Steve Meerson (screenplay), Chris Thompson (screenplay), Lou Rusoff (characters)
Actors: Frankie Avalon, Annette Funicello, Lori Loughlin, Tommy Hinkley
Plot: Frankie and Annette grow up and have kids in the midwest. They return to LA to visit their daughter who is shacked up with her boyfriend and tries to hide the fact. They begin to have marriage problems when Frankie runs into Connie, who has erected a shrine to him in her night club. Their punk son has joined up with the local surf toughs, and things all come to a head when the toughs challenge the good guys to a surfing duel.
